original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a crucial bridge between business needs and technical solutions, requiring a unique blend of business acumen, analytical skills, and technical proficiency. As a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business requirements and operate efficiently, you will be responsible for translating complex business processes into effective system configurations. Your focus will be on developing new processes and leveraging cutting-edge technologies, such as machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), to drive innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging tools like database querying, reporting, and data visualization.
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT).
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps.
- Work collaboratively with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and address complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively liaise with both technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in Java and SQL, enabling you to work seamlessly with the underlying systems and data

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, allowing you to leverage cutting-edge technologies to drive innovative solutions
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies, enabling you to adapt to changing requirements and deliver value iteratively
- Knowledge of vehicle configuration processes, providing a deeper understanding of the domain and its unique challenges

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a similar role, where you have demonstrated the ability to bridge business and technical requirements
- Proven track record of successfully translating complex business needs into effective system configurations

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment and collaborating with cross-functional teams
- Prior exposure to vehicle configuration processes or a related industry, providing a valuable contextual understanding

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration tools
- SQL and data analysis tools
- Agile project management tools
- Collaboration and documentation tools

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a focus on continuous improvement
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to deliver high-quality solutions
- Willingness to adapt to changing business requirements and priorities
- Strong attention to detail and a commitment to delivering accurate and reliable configurations

Role Overview:
This role is a critical link between business objectives and technical implementation, requiring a unique combination of strategic thinking, analytical prowess, and technical expertise. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for translating complex business processes into efficient and effective system configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. Your focus will be on driving innovation and optimization through the application of cutting-edge technologies, such as machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), to enhance the vehicle configuration experience.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to deeply understand their business needs, gather comprehensive requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Leverage your technical proficiency to translate the gathered business requirements into robust and scalable system configurations, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, and implementing and testing new configurations.
- Proactively identify and resolve configuration-related issues, drawing on your strong troubleshooting and problem-solving skills to ensure the seamless operation of our systems.
- Analyze existing data to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, using tools like database querying, reporting, and data visualization to drive data-driven decision-making.
- Propose and implement configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency, leveraging your deep understanding of the domain and technical expertise.
- Participate actively in user acceptance testing (UAT) to ensure configurations meet the defined requirements and function as expected.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing system maintenance and knowledge sharing.
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to facilitate smooth implementation and provide ongoing support for the system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills to tackle complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to effectively liaise with both technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Strong Java and SQL skills, enabling you to work seamlessly with the underlying systems and data

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, allowing you to leverage cutting-edge technologies to drive innovative solutions
- Experience with Agile methodologies, demonstrating your ability to adapt to changing requirements and deliver value iteratively
- Knowledge of vehicle configuration processes, providing a deeper understanding of the domain and its unique challenges

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a similar role, where you have successfully bridged business and technical requirements
- Proven track record of translating complex business needs into effective and efficient system configurations

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment and collaborating with cross-functional teams
- Prior exposure to vehicle configuration processes or a related industry, providing valuable domain expertise

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration tools
- SQL and data analysis tools
- Agile project management tools
- Collaboration and documentation tools

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, fast-paced team environment with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to deliver high-quality, reliable solutions
- Adaptability to changing business requirements and priorities, with a proactive approach to problem-solving
- Strong attention to detail and a commitment to ensuring accurate and well-documented configurations

Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business strategy and technical implementation, requiring a unique blend of strategic thinking, analytical prowess, and technical expertise. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for translating complex business processes into efficient and scalable system configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. Your focus will be on driving innovation and optimization through the application of cutting-edge technologies, such as machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), to enhance the vehicle configuration experience and deliver tangible business value.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to deeply understand their business needs, gather comprehensive requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Leverage your strong technical proficiency to translate the gathered business requirements into robust and scalable system configurations, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, and implementing and testing new configurations.
- Proactively identify and resolve configuration-related issues, drawing on your exceptional troubleshooting and problem-solving skills to ensure the seamless operation of our systems.
- Analyze existing data to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, using tools like database querying, reporting, and data visualization to drive data-driven decision-making and process optimization.
- Propose and implement configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency, leveraging your deep understanding of the domain and technical expertise.
- Actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) to ensure configurations meet the defined requirements and function as expected, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing system maintenance and knowledge sharing.
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to facilitate smooth implementation and provide ongoing support for the system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and strategic thinking skills to identify and address complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to effectively liaise with both technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Strong Java and SQL skills, enabling you to work seamlessly with the underlying systems and data

Preferred Skills:
- Expertise in machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, allowing you to leverage cutting-edge technologies to drive innovative solutions and deliver tangible business value
- Experience with Agile methodologies, demonstrating your ability to adapt to changing requirements and deliver value iteratively
- In-depth knowledge of vehicle configuration processes, providing a deeper understanding of the domain and its unique challenges

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5-7 years of experience in a similar role, where you have successfully bridged business and technical requirements to drive strategic initiatives
- Proven track record of translating complex business needs into effective and efficient system configurations that deliver measurable business impact

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver complex, high-stakes projects
- Prior exposure to vehicle configuration processes or a related industry, providing valuable domain expertise and context

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration tools
- SQL and advanced data analysis tools
- Agile project management tools
- Collaboration and documentation tools

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, fast-paced, and innovative team environment with a focus on continuous improvement and strategic alignment
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to deliver high-quality, reliable, and scalable solutions
- Adaptability to changing business requirements and priorities, with a proactive and strategic approach to problem-solving
- Strong attention to detail and a commitment to ensuring accurate, well-documented, and efficient configurations that drive tangible business value
